page.title: 18THOMAS'S HOBBIES
page.content: IN MY SPARE TIME I WATCH TELEVISION. SOMETIMES I PLAY WITH MY FRIEND AT RACING ROUND THE BLOCK ON MY BICYCLE. I RARELY GO TO THE PARK DOWN THE ROAD BECAUSE I'M NOT ALLOWED ON MY OWN. ON SATURDAYS I GO TO ANOTHER OF MY FRIENDS HOUSES AND PLAY ON THE QUAY. WE PLAY ON THE SWINGS AND SLIDES. WHEN THE TIDE IS LOW WE PLAY IN THE MUD OF THE QUAY THEN WE BUY SWEETS AND FIZZY DRINKS. I GO SAILING SOMETIMES BUT IT TAKES A LONG TIME SETTING UP THE BOAT. QUITE OFTEN I PLAY FOOTBALL IN THE GARDEN. ON MONDAYS AFTER SCHOOL I GO SWIMMING. I CAN SWIM 1500 METRES. MY HOBBY IS DRIVING MY RADIO-CONTROLLED BUGGY. IT GOES 20 MPH. I DRIVE IT IN THE CAR PARK UP MY ROAD.
